job.title: Software Engineer - Twitch-Music
job.description: ltstronggtltugtAbout UsltbrgtltbrgtltugtltstronggtLaunched in 2011 Twitch is a global community that comes together each day to create multiplayer entertainment unique live unpredictable experiences created by the interactions of millions We bring the joy of coop to everything from casual gaming to worldclass esports to anime marathons music and art streams Twitch also hosts TwitchCon where we bring everyone together to celebrate learn and grow their personal interests and passions Were always live at Twitch Stay up to date on all things Twitch on LinkedIn  Twitter and on our Blog ltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltugtAbout The RoleltbrgtltbrgtltugtltstronggtYou will have demonstrated experience building frontend and backend codebase You have knowledge of frontend and backend engineering methods how best to meet latency code in ReactJS or VanillaJS You will also have experience doing codereviews and setting best engineering practicesltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltugtYou WillltbrgtltugtltstronggtltulgtltligtEmbrace and champion engineering best practices within your group and TwitchltligtltligtWork with product managers designers and other collaborators to build great experiencesltligtltligtPartner with fellow engineering teams to accomplish complex programsltligtltligtDevelop new music product services and features ltligtltligtImprove existing APIs and services with a heavy focus on scale and availabilityltligtltligt Youll identify and uphold frontend ampamp backend engineering best practicesltligtltligtWork in a supportive team environment with shared code code reviews and disciplined quality control quality begins with the developers on the teamltligtltligtProduce clean code tests and well written documentationltligtltulgt ltstronggtltstronggtYou HaveltbrgtltstronggtltstronggtltulgtltligtBachelors degree or above in Computer ScienceEngineering or prior engineering experienceltligtltligtProficient coder in the following Go Java C or similar languagesltligtltligtExperience developing web applications and their backend APIsltligtltligtFamiliarity with web technologies and languages JavaScriptTypeScriptltligtltligtExperience working with product managers designers and other engineering leadersltligtltligtFamiliarity in the AWS ecosystem of services EC2 RDS Dynamo Lambda and CloudWatchltligtltligtFluency in data structures algorithms data modeling and schema designltligtltulgt ltstronggtltstronggtBonus PointsltbrgtltstronggtltstronggtltulgtltligtFamiliarity with GraphqlltligtltligtProficiency in ReactJSltligtltligtProficiency in ML or Mobile Developmentltligtltulgt ltstronggtltstronggtPerksltbrgtltstronggtltstronggtltulgtltligtMedical Dental Vision ampamp Disability Insuranceltligtltligt 401k  Maternity ampamp Parental Leave ltligtltligtFlexible PTOltligtltligt Commuter Benefits ltligtltligtAmazon Employee DiscountltligtltligtMonthly Contribution ampamp Discounts for Wellness Related Activities ampamp Programs eg gym memberships offsite massages  etc ltligtltligtBreakfast Lunch ampamp Dinner Served DailyltligtltligtFree Snacks ampamp Beverages ltbrgtltligtltulgtPursuant to the San Francisco Fair Chance Ordinance we will consider for employment qualified applicants with arrest and conviction recordsltbrgtltbrgtWe are an equal opportunity employer and value diversity at Twitch We do not discriminate on the
